author: bmanikm
body:
1. Update PowerShellGet to install the modules and scripts to proper locations in PowerShell Core on Windows #2021. 
2. Added few CI tests for PowerShellGet

comments.author: bmanikm
comments.body: Please ignore the changes in fcf747d and 97eb76c commits. Those changes were already merged with master in my last PR.
